attributes.action: Change the planning system to encourage the building of skyskrapers to allow more homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Encourage the building of more skyscrapers. This will enable the density of houses to increase and therefore allow for less building on green feild sites. It will also produce more houses and therefore reduce the price of a house. They dont have to be as badly built as last time.
